meanings.definition: A traditional garment worn by men in India.
meanings.sent1: He proudly wore his dhuti to the wedding.
meanings.sent2: The bright colors of the dhuti caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent3: The dhuti looked like a colorful rainbow wrapped around him.
meanings.sent4: His dhuti was a symbol of his cultural heritage.
meanings.sent5: The intricate patterns on the dhuti were mesmerizing.

meanings.definition: A type of cloth used for making garments.
meanings.sent1: The soft dhuti fabric was perfect for making traditional clothes.
meanings.sent2: She bought a few meters of dhuti to sew a new dress.
meanings.sent3: The dhuti material felt like a cozy hug.
meanings.sent4: The dhuti cloth was as smooth as silk.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors of the dhuti fabric brightened up the room.

meanings.definition: To wrap or tie around the waist.
meanings.sent1: He learned how to dhuti the cloth around his waist.
meanings.sent2: She asked him to dhuti the scarf around her waist.
meanings.sent3: He tried to dhuti the rope but ended up in a knot.
meanings.sent4: The dancer gracefully dhutied the ribbon around her waist.
meanings.sent5: He quickly dhutied the belt before heading out.
